articles.author: Josh Pos
articles.title: Game preview: No. 19 IU football hosts No. 9 Illinois in primetime - Inside the Hall
articles.description: Big Ten play has finally arrived and the game that's been on the calendar is nearing kickoff – a top-20 showdown between 9th-ranked Illinois and 19th-ranked Indiana to open conference play.
articles.content:
Big Ten play has finally arrived and the game that’s been on the calendar is nearing kickoff a top-20 showdown between 9th-ranked Illinois and 19th-ranked Indiana to open conference play.
